text: (yuddha kirima valakvanu læba æti rajab, dul kaada, dul haj, muharram adi masayanhi) usas karana lada masayan sandaha, usas karana lada masayayi. ebævin usas dæyata (sama vana) dæya æta. ebævin kavurun ho simava ikmava oba kerehi (ema masayanhi yuddha kirimata) pæminiyahot ohu oba kerehi simava ikmavu akarayatama obat ohu kerehi simava ikmava (yuddhayata) yanu. namut oba allahta biya vi (ema masayanhi yuddhaya arambha nokara) sitinu. allah bhaya bhaktikayin samaga sitinneya yannada sthira vasayen oba dæna ganu
